author: danielf
msg: Adding expression language with services and dependencies to the OSGi runtime. The JXPath bundle from Felix didn't export a package that is needed for the EL, so I forked it.

author: jdillon
msg: Build a map of the discovered command descriptors, use the collector to render help

author: scheu
msg: When a persisted OperationContext is "activated", it should only be registered on
the ConfigurationContext if a response is expected.  Otherwise the OperationContext
will never be freed and could lead to out-of-memory problems.
